levels.description: Immediately buffs two friendly Operators within range (prioritizing units with <$ba.debuff>Negative Status</>), healing them equal to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of Nowell's ATK every second for {status_resistance[limit]}s and granting them <$ba.buffres>status resistance</>
